Description:
On this week’s Open Source Friday, we highlight Cilium, an open source project that provides modern networking, security, and observability for cloud-native environments using eBPF.

03:30 Welcome to Open Source Fridays 03:49 Introduction to Cilium 04:45 The Evolution of Networking 05:11 Challenges in Container Networking 06:40 What is eBPF? 08:39 The Power of eBPF in Linux Kernel 13:32 Why Choose Cilium? 14:32 Cilium's Key Features 19:04 Hands-On with Cilium 24:03 Network Policy Deployment 24:27 Observability with Hubble 26:06 Getting Started with Cilium 26:39 Cilium's Expanding Capabilities 28:52 Business Value of Cilium 30:06 Operational Costs and Migration 33:50 Contributing to Cilium 36:36 The Role of the eBPF Foundation 41:38 Conclusion and Final Thoughts

Title: Open Source Friday with Cilium
Author: GitHub
